metadata.titleEn: High precision MC-ICP-MS data set for Mo isotope analysis of igneous rocks with low Mo content
metadata.titleCn: 高精度低Mo含量火成岩样品Mo同位素MC-ICP-MS分析数据集
metadata.description: The data in this paper include the Mo content and isotopic ratio analysis data of different types of igneous rock standard samples (basalt bir-1a, diabase w-2a, dunite dts-2b, wpr-1 and peridotite gpt-3) and low Mo content leucogranite. The Leucogranites are from saga, Cuona and zhengga areas in southern Tibet; Mo isotope analysis data were determined by multi collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (MC – ICP – MS), and the standard sample and leucogranite data were obtained to verify the accuracy and accuracy of the established analysis method for low Mo content samples, so as to achieve high-precision Mo isotope analysis for more low content samples.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本文数据包含不同类型火成岩标样（玄武岩BIR-1a, 辉绿岩W-2a, 纯橄岩DTS-2b、WPR-1和橄榄岩GPt-3）和低Mo含量淡色花岗岩Mo含量和同位素比值分析数据。淡色花岗岩采自西藏南部萨嘎、错那和正嘎地区；Mo同位素分析数据通过使用多收集器-电感耦合等离子体质谱（MC–ICP–MS）测定，获得的标样及淡色花岗岩数据用与验证所建立的低Mo含量样品分析方法的精度和准确度，以实现对更多的低含量样品进行高精度的Mo同位素分析。
metadata.instructions: All data are stored in Excel file: the file name is ig.std.xls, which represents the Mo content and isotope ratio analysis data of igneous rocks and standard samples
metadata.instructionsCn: 所有数据以Excel文件存储：文件名为IG.STD.xls代表火成岩及标样Mo含量和同位素比值分析数据

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What data collection methods are used for obtaining Mo isotope analysis in low Mo content igneous rock samples?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在低钼含量的火成岩样品中，获取钼同位素分析所使用的数据收集方法有哪些？
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 多接收电感耦合等离子体质谱仪 (MC–ICP–MS)

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used for analyzing Mo isotope ratios in low Mo content igneous rock samples?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一种用于分析低钼含量火成岩样品中钼同位素比率的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used for analyzing Mo isotope ratios in low Mo content igneous rock samples involves using multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (MC-ICP-MS) to determine the Mo content and isotope ratios. This method is applied to various igneous rock standards, including basalt BIR-1a, diabase W-2a, peridotite DTS-2b, WPR-1, and dunite GPt-3, as well as low Mo content leucogranites collected from regions in southern Tibet such as Saga, Cuona, and Zhengga.
Example.AnswerCn: 用于分析低钼含量火成岩样品中钼同位素比率的数据收集方法的一个例子是使用多收集器电感耦合等离子体质谱法（MC-ICP-MS）来确定钼的含量和同位素比率。该方法应用于各种火成岩标准，包括玄武岩BIR-1a、辉绿岩W-2a、橄榄岩DTS-2b、WPR-1和辉长岩GPt-3，以及来自南藏地区（如萨嘎、错那和郑嘎）收集的低钼含量的白花岗岩。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the specific characteristics of Mo isotope data when collected from low Mo content igneous rock samples using MC-ICP-MS?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 使用MC-ICP-MS从低钼含量的火成岩样品中收集钼同位素数据时的具体特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: precise measurements, accurate measurements, Mo content, isotopic ratios
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 精确测量，准确测量，钼含量，同位素比率

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many different types of igneous rock samples are analyzed for Mo isotopic composition using MC-ICP-MS in a dataset related to this field?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在与该领域相关的数据集中，分析了多少种不同类型的火成岩样品的钼同位素组成，使用的是MC-ICP-MS？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'MC-ICP-MS' mean in the context of analyzing Mo isotopes in igneous rock samples?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在分析火成岩样品中的钼同位素时，“MC-ICP-MS”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: MC-ICP-MS stands for Multi-Collector Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometry, a technique used to measure Mo isotopes in igneous rock samples with high precision and accuracy. It is instrumental in verifying the analytical method's precision for low Mo content samples.
Definition.AnswerCn: MC-ICP-MS代表多收集器电感耦合等离子体质谱法，这是一种用于高精度和准确性地测量火成岩样品中钼同位素的技术。它在验证低钼含量样品的分析方法精度方面具有重要作用。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives behind developing a data collection method for Mo isotope analysis in low Mo content igneous rock samples using MC-ICP-MS?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发低Mo含量火成岩样品的Mo同位素分析数据收集方法的目标是什么，使用MC-ICP-MS？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to establish and validate a high-precision method for analyzing Mo isotopes in low Mo content samples, such as light-colored granites, using MC-ICP-MS. This aims to ensure accuracy and precision in Mo isotope analysis across a broader range of low-content samples, enhancing the understanding of igneous rock formation and geochemical processes.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是建立和验证一种高精度的方法，通过MC-ICP-MS分析低钼含量样品中的钼同位素，例如浅色花岗岩。这旨在确保在更广泛的低含量样品中进行钼同位素分析的准确性和精确性，从而增强对火成岩形成和地球化学过程的理解。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures can be followed to ensure high precision and accuracy in Mo isotope analysis of low Mo content igneous rock samples using MC–ICP–MS?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在使用MC–ICP–MS对低Mo含量火成岩样品进行Mo同位素分析时，可以遵循哪些程序以确保高精度和准确性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To achieve high precision and accuracy in Mo isotope analysis of low Mo content igneous rock samples using MC–ICP–MS, it involves using different types of igneous rock standards such as basalt BIR-1a, diabase W-2a, peridotite DTS-2b, WPR-1, and GPt-3, as well as low Mo content leucogranite samples from regions in southern Tibet. The Mo isotope data is obtained through multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry, and the data from the standards and leucogranite is used to verify the precision and accuracy of the analytical method established for low Mo content samples.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了在低钼含量的火成岩样品中实现高精度和高准确度的钼同位素分析，采用了不同类型的火成岩标准，如玄武岩BIR-1a、辉绿岩W-2a、橄榄岩DTS-2b、WPR-1和GPt-3，以及来自南藏地区的低钼含量的白花岗岩样品。钼同位素数据通过多收集器电感耦合等离子体质谱法（MC–ICP–MS）获得，标准样品和白花岗岩的数据用于验证针对低钼含量样品建立的分析方法的精度和准确性。
